Actions.click-experimental: Alternative to click, use this if click is causing issues.
Actions.get-text: Gets the text for a specified element.
Actions.fill-text: Assigns the specified value to the selected element.
Actions.save-as-html: Saves the current pages HTML to a file with the specified name.
Actions.select-dropdown-element: Selects an element from within a dropdown menu.
Actions.select-element: Selects the element associated with the provided selector (if found).
Actions.take-screenshot: Takes a screenshot of the browser after executing the previous line.
Actions.wait-for-seconds: Waits for the specified number of seconds before continuing.

Features.async: This indicates the compiler you want to create an asynchronous script, this should not be done unless you have experience using async functions in python.
Features.browser: This MUST be the first valid line of the file; If not supplied, defaults to firefox instance or user agent (depending on the other defined features)
Features.bypass-cloudflare: Instructs the browser to use a more advanced approach to bypass cloudflare
Features.disable-pycache: Instructs the compiler to disable the writing of the __pycache__ directory.  This directory is written by Visual Studio Code and contains .pyc files
Features.use-http-proxy: Uses the entered http proxy for the session.
Features.use-https-proxy: Uses the entered https proxy for the session.
Features.use-socks4-proxy: Uses the entered socks4 proxy for the session.
Features.use-socks5-proxy: Uses the entered socks5 proxy for the session.

TODO.start-javascript: Instructs the parser to read all following lines as a .js code block, until end-javascript is found; Will throw an error if end-javascript is not found within the file.
TODO.end-javascript: Instructs the parser that the end of a javascript code block was reached.  An error will be thrown if end-javascript is not found within the file.
TODO.no-ssl: This will instruct the compiler to disable ssl within the script.
